data.eml:eml: The genus Hygrocrates Deeleman-Reinhold, 1988 (Araneae, Dysderidae) in Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kunt, Kadir Bogac, Yagmur, Ersen Aydin, Oezkuetuek, Recep Sulhi, Kaya, Rahsen S. (2011): The genus Hygrocrates Deeleman-Reinhold, 1988 (Araneae, Dysderidae) in Turkey. ZooKeys 85: 1-16, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.85.927, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.85.927
